page.shortlink: ux controlbar items clipping rectangle bottom property
page.description: The distance in pixels from the bottom of the screen to the bottom edge of the clipping rectangle.

discussion.p: Defines the distance between the bottom of the clipping rectangle and the screen. For example, if a value of 50 is specified for the *[ui:bottom]* property, the bottom edge of the clipping rectangle with be 50 pixels from the bottom of the screen.
